title: please fix this bug riot!
body: it's not my keyboard, my keyboard is fine, it's not my internet my internet is completely fine. Please fix this thing where when I am into the game, the keys don't appear like for instance, when I press QWER the keys don't appear. This is happened to me on 3 games already I had to close the game and log back in to fix the issue in some games I even had to afk and leave because of how bad this problem persisted. SAY SOMETHING I already posted this twice and nothing, no feed back no answers

replies.body:
Sorry about the slow response, with the release of Runes Reforged the boards have been wee bit backed up (as you can likely tell). While your keybinds aren't working, it might be smarter to troubleshoot in a custom or practice game to avoid possible leaverbuster penalties. 

Let's try resetting your config settings to make sure those haven't been messed up first. Follow these steps exactly and let me know if that helps!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QENHanoG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T05:36:03.837+0000)
>
> Sorry about the slow response, with the release of Runes Reforged the boards have been wee bit backed up (as you can likely tell). While your keybinds aren't working, it might be smarter to troubleshoot in a custom or practice game to avoid possible leaverbuster penalties. 
> 
> Let's try resetting your config settings to make sure those haven't been messed up first. Follow these steps exactly and let me know if that helps!
> 
> - Log into the game client
> - Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> - Delete the folder named **Config**
> - Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
> - Leave game to sync settings

ty I'll tell you, oy repost if the problem persists.

this has happened to me a few times also. I use a Razor keyboard. It'll be fine for a few games, then suddenly I go to use an ability, the indicator will pop up, then I won't be able to use any abilities from my keyboard anymore. Quitting and rejoining has fixed the issue for me though. It's really intermittent. Even tried shutting down Razor Synapse mid game, but that didn't do anything either.
